name: ILLINOIS TOOL WORKS INC. v. INDEPENDENT INK, INC.
court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion: Today, we reach the same conclusion, and therefore hold that, in all cases involving a tying arrangement, the plaintiff must prove that the defendant has market power in the tying product.
judgement: The judgment of the Court of Appeals is vacated, and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with this opinion.

name: ILLINOIS TOOL WORKS INC. v. INDEPENDENT INK, INC.
court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion: When the case returns to the District Court, respondent should therefore be given a fair opportunity to develop and introduce evidence on that issue, as well as any other issues that are relevant to its remaining ยง 1 claims.
judgement: The judgment of the Court of Appeals is vacated, and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with this opinion.

name: Justice Alito
opinion: Took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
